name: The Divine Demons Grand Ascension
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeUnknown
content: The Divine Demon’s Grand Ascension Manhwa The Ten Demonic Sects are considered the heavens of the Demonic Path. When they combined their strength, the world called them the Demon Palace. And now in the sanctuary of the world’s demons, the Divine Demon to devour all that is of the murim opens his eyes. 신마대제, The Great Heavenly Demon Sovereign
